%title /ab/experiments/{experimentId} GET 获取指定的Experiment

=/ab/experiments/{code} GET=
%toc

==功能 ==
查询指定的`Experiment`信息

==URL==
/ab/experiments/{code}

==HTTP请求方式==
GET

==请求参数==
=== 路径参数 ===
| 参数名 | 值     | 描述                         |
|--------|--------|------------------------------|
| code   | 数字型 | 要查询的 `Experiment` 的code |


==返回格式==
JSON XML

==测试==
{{{ class="brush:bash"
curl -Hacccept:application/xml https://baseurl/ab/experiments/HOTEL_HOME_PAGE_BANNER906453e3-5f86-48d3-a093-de8dee183e74
curl -Hacccept:application/json https://baseurl/ab/experiments/HOTEL_HOME_PAGE_BANNER906453e3-5f86-48d3-a093-de8dee183e74                                                       
  }}}
